title: Shaman AFK (50)
comment_one:
*1= Boost agi  to have 308 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
"Idle Casting" to 75 for 12%
Priority switches to  Overclocked energy > Gilded sword > Sharpened axe
comment_two:
You want to level up "Energy bolt" and "Mini fireball" to about 50
"Power overwhelming", "Individual insight" and "Knowledge is power" have less priority in afk builds.
comment_three:
Level up the damaging skills evenly. 
 Put 20-30 points into "Virile Vials" (skip this part if you dont have many green vials.)
notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monsterâ€™s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
